  (disp_adjequiv_sigma_help x xx1 xx2 yy2 p) = p

        
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ

x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
p: disp_adjoint_equivalence
  (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity (x,, xx1))
  xx2 yy2
isPredicate
  (disp_left_adjoint_equivalence
     (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity (x,, xx1)))

C: bicat

C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
p: disp_adjoint_equivalence
  (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity (x,, xx1))
  xx2 yy2
pr1
  (disp_adjequiv_sigma_help_inv x xx1 xx2 yy2
     (disp_adjequiv_sigma_help x xx1 xx2 yy2 p)) =
pr1 p

        apply idpath.
      
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
‚àè
y : disp_adjoint_equivalence
      (invmap
         (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
         (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
          disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)) xx2
      yy2,
disp_adjequiv_sigma_help x xx1 xx2 yy2
  (disp_adjequiv_sigma_help_inv x xx1 xx2 yy2 y) = y
 
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
p: disp_adjoint_equivalence
  (invmap
     (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
     (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
      disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)) xx2
  yy2
disp_adjequiv_sigma_help x xx1 xx2 yy2
  (disp_adjequiv_sigma_help_inv x xx1 xx2 yy2 p) = p

        
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
p: disp_adjoint_equivalence
  (invmap
     (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
     (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
      disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)) xx2
  yy2
isPredicate
  (disp_left_adjoint_equivalence
     (invmap
        (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
        (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
         disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)))
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
p: disp_adjoint_equivalence
  (invmap
     (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
     (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
      disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)) xx2
  yy2
pr1
  (disp_adjequiv_sigma_help x xx1 xx2 yy2
     (disp_adjequiv_sigma_help_inv x xx1 xx2 yy2 p)) =
pr1 p

        
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
p: disp_adjoint_equivalence
  (invmap
     (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
     (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
      disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)) xx2
  yy2
isPredicate
  (disp_left_adjoint_equivalence
     (invmap
        (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
        (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
         disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)))

D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
p: disp_adjoint_equivalence
  (invmap
     (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
     (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
      disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)) xx2
  yy2
x0: xx2 -->[
invmap
  (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
  (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
   disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)] yy2
is_univalent_2_1 DispAdjunctions.E

C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C

p: disp_adjoint_equivalence
  (invmap
     (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
     (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
      disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)) xx2
  yy2
pr1
  (disp_adjequiv_sigma_help x xx1 xx2 yy2
     (disp_adjequiv_sigma_help_inv x xx1 xx2 yy2 p)) =
pr1 p

        apply idpath.
  Defined.

  
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
xx = yy
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (idtoiso_2_0 x x (idpath x)) xx yy

  
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
xx = yy
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (idtoiso_2_0 x x (idpath x)) xx yy

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
xx ‚ïù yy
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (idtoiso_2_0 x x (idpath x)) xx yy

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
xx ‚ïù yy
‚âÉ (‚àë
   p : disp_adjoint_equivalence
         (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x)
         (pr1 xx) (pr1 yy),
   disp_adjoint_equivalence
     (invmap
        (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq (pr1 xx)
           (pr1 yy))
        (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,, p))
     (pr2 xx) (pr2 yy))

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
‚àè
x0 : transportf (Œª z : C, D‚ÇÅ z) (idpath x) (pr1 xx) =
     pr1 yy,
transportf (Œª x1 : D‚ÇÅ x, D‚ÇÇ (x,, x1)) x0 (pr2 xx) =
pr2 yy
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (invmap
       (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq (pr1 xx)
          (pr1 yy))
       (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
        make_weq
          (disp_idtoiso_2_0 D‚ÇÅ (idpath x) (pr1 xx)
             (pr1 yy))
          (HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 x x (idpath x) (pr1 xx) (pr1 yy))
          x0)) (pr2 xx) (pr2 yy)

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
‚àè
x0 : transportf (Œª z : C, D‚ÇÅ z) (idpath x)
       (pr1 (xx1,, xx2)) = pr1 yy,
transportf (Œª x1 : D‚ÇÅ x, D‚ÇÇ (x,, x1)) x0
  (pr2 (xx1,, xx2)) = pr2 yy
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (invmap
       (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq
          (pr1 (xx1,, xx2)) (pr1 yy))
       (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
        make_weq
          (disp_idtoiso_2_0 D‚ÇÅ (idpath x)
             (pr1 (xx1,, xx2)) (pr1 yy))
          (HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 x x (idpath x) (pr1 (xx1,, xx2))
             (pr1 yy)) x0)) (pr2 (xx1,, xx2)) (pr2 yy)

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
yy1: D‚ÇÅ x
yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, yy1)
‚àè
x0 : transportf (Œª z : C, D‚ÇÅ z) (idpath x)
       (pr1 (xx1,, xx2)) = pr1 (yy1,, yy2),
transportf (Œª x1 : D‚ÇÅ x, D‚ÇÇ (x,, x1)) x0
  (pr2 (xx1,, xx2)) = pr2 (yy1,, yy2)
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (invmap
       (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq
          (pr1 (xx1,, xx2)) (pr1 (yy1,, yy2)))
       (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
        make_weq
          (disp_idtoiso_2_0 D‚ÇÅ (idpath x)
             (pr1 (xx1,, xx2)) (pr1 (yy1,, yy2)))
          (HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 x x (idpath x) (pr1 (xx1,, xx2))
             (pr1 (yy1,, yy2))) x0)) (pr2 (xx1,, xx2))
    (pr2 (yy1,, yy2))

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
yy1: D‚ÇÅ x
yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, yy1)
p: xx1 = yy1
transportf (Œª x0 : D‚ÇÅ x, D‚ÇÇ (x,, x0)) p
  (pr2 (xx1,, xx2)) = pr2 (yy1,, yy2)
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (invmap
       (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq
          (pr1 (xx1,, xx2)) (pr1 (yy1,, yy2)))
       (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
        make_weq
          (disp_idtoiso_2_0 D‚ÇÅ (idpath x)
             (pr1 (xx1,, xx2)) (pr1 (yy1,, yy2)))
          (HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 x x (idpath x) (pr1 (xx1,, xx2))
             (pr1 (yy1,, yy2))) p)) (pr2 (xx1,, xx2))
    (pr2 (yy1,, yy2))

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
transportf (Œª x0 : D‚ÇÅ x, D‚ÇÇ (x,, x0)) (idpath xx1)
  (pr2 (xx1,, xx2)) = pr2 (xx1,, yy2)
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (invmap
       (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq
          (pr1 (xx1,, xx2)) (pr1 (xx1,, yy2)))
       (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
        make_weq
          (disp_idtoiso_2_0 D‚ÇÅ (idpath x)
             (pr1 (xx1,, xx2)) (pr1 (xx1,, yy2)))
          (HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 x x (idpath x) (pr1 (xx1,, xx2))
             (pr1 (xx1,, yy2))) (idpath xx1)))
    (pr2 (xx1,, xx2)) (pr2 (xx1,, yy2))

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
xx2 = yy2
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (invmap
       (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
       (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
        disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)) xx2
    yy2

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx1: D‚ÇÅ x
xx2, yy2: D‚ÇÇ (x,, xx1)
disp_adjoint_equivalence
  (idtoiso_2_0 (x,, xx1) (x,, xx1) (idpath (x,, xx1)))
  xx2 yy2
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (invmap
       (adjoint_equivalence_total_disp_weq xx1 xx1)
       (internal_adjoint_equivalence_identity x,,
        disp_identity_adjoint_equivalence xx1)) xx2
    yy2

    exact (disp_adjequiv_sigma_help_weq x xx1 xx2 yy2).
  Defined.

  
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ

HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
disp_univalent_2_0 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ)

  
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ

C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ

fiberwise_univalent_2_0 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ)

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ

HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ

LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
isweq
  (disp_idtoiso_2_0 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ) (idpath x)
     xx yy)

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
transportf (Œª z : C, sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ z) (idpath x)
  xx = yy
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (idtoiso_2_0 x x (idpath x)) xx yy
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
?w ~
disp_idtoiso_2_0 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ) 
  (idpath x) xx yy

    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
transportf (Œª z : C, sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ z) (idpath x)
  xx = yy
‚âÉ disp_adjoint_equivalence
    (idtoiso_2_0 x x (idpath x)) xx yy
 exact (sigma_idtoiso_2_0_alt HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 HD‚ÇÇ_2_0 xx yy).
    
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ

LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
sigma_idtoiso_2_0_alt HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 HD‚ÇÇ_2_0 xx yy ~
disp_idtoiso_2_0 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ) (idpath x) xx
  yy
 
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx, yy: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
p: transportf (Œª z : C, sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ z)
  (idpath x) xx = yy
sigma_idtoiso_2_0_alt HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 HD‚ÇÇ_2_0 xx yy p =
disp_idtoiso_2_0 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ) (idpath x) xx
  yy p

      
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ

p: xx = yy

disp_idtoiso_2_0 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ) (idpath x) xx
  yy p

      
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ

HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ

HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
sigma_idtoiso_2_0_alt HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 HD‚ÇÇ_2_0 xx xx
  (idpath xx) =
disp_idtoiso_2_0 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ) (idpath x) xx
  xx (idpath xx)

      
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ

x: C
xx: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
isPredicate
  (disp_left_adjoint_equivalence
     (idtoiso_2_0 x x (idpath x)))
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ

HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
pr1
  (sigma_idtoiso_2_0_alt HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 HD‚ÇÇ_2_0 xx xx
     (idpath xx)) =
pr1
  (disp_idtoiso_2_0 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ) 
     (idpath x) xx xx (idpath xx))

     (idtoiso_2_0 x x (idpath x)))

C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C

HC: is_univalent_2 C

x0: xx -->[ idtoiso_2_0 x x (idpath x)] xx
is_univalent_2_1 C
 exact (pr2 HC).
        
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
x0: xx -->[ idtoiso_2_0 x x (idpath x)] xx
disp_univalent_2_1 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ)
 apply sigma_disp_univalent_2_1_with_props ; assumption.
      
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)
HC: is_univalent_2 C
HD‚ÇÅ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ: disp_2cells_isaprop D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_1: disp_univalent_2_1 D‚ÇÇ
LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2_0: disp_univalent_2_0 D‚ÇÇ
x: C
xx: sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ x
pr1
  (sigma_idtoiso_2_0_alt HD‚ÇÅ_2_0 HD‚ÇÇ_2_0 xx xx
     (idpath xx)) =
pr1
  (disp_idtoiso_2_0 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ) (idpath x)
     xx xx (idpath xx))

      apply idpath.
  Defined.

  
C: bicat
D‚ÇÅ: disp_bicat C
D‚ÇÇ: disp_bicat (total_bicat D‚ÇÅ)

LG‚ÇÅ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÅ
LG‚ÇÇ: disp_locally_groupoid D‚ÇÇ
HD‚ÇÅ_2: disp_univalent_2 D‚ÇÅ
HD‚ÇÇ_2: disp_univalent_2 D‚ÇÇ
disp_univalent_2 (sigma_bicat C D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ)
